definition: success or failure
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
lit. success and failure, the gains and losses (idiom)/fig. to weigh up various factors
succeed or fail, sharp or blunt (idiom); advantages and disadvantages/success and failure/You win some, you lose some.
to sit and await success or failure (idiom); to wait to see the outcome of a fight before taking sides/to sit on the fence
win or lose, it all ends here/this is the moment to shine
pinyin: cheng2 bai4 zai4 ci3 yi1 ju3

definition: to judge people based on their success or failure (idiom)

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is an import geological problem which should have an effect on Three Gorges Reservoir Project.
sentences.chinese: 水库塌岸是影响三峡水库工程成败的重大地质问题。

sentences.english: The key to success for Otis is team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奥的斯的成败系于团队精神。

sentences.english: The definition of an investment should never be a trade gone awry.
sentences.chinese: 投资不能以一次交易论成败。

sentences.english: I've had a lot of ups and downs in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，每个人的一生都充满着得失成败。

sentences.english: Obviously, such technical details are dwarfed by larger issues when it comes to determining mobile-market success.
sentences.chinese: 显然，在衡量成败方面，技术细节并非如此重要。
他们得到了成败各半的机会。

sentences.english: Marketing success or failure is directly traceable to the support that top management gives or withholds .
sentences.chinese: 市场营销的成败直接归因于最高管理层能否给予支持。

sentences.english: Attention to details is what seperates success from failure.
sentences.chinese: 对细节的关注往往是决定成败的关键。

sentences.english: And they decide the success or failure of a person's life.
sentences.chinese: 而它的品级决定一个人一生的成败。

sentences.english: Whether this will be successful or not is still difficult to predict.
The leading cadres' fine life-style relates to the cause of the Party success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 领导干部的生活作风关系到党的事业成败。

sentences.english: I tell them the deil is in the details .
sentences.chinese: 我告诉他们细节决定成败。

sentences.english: The fifth part analyses the impact of Wang Anshi's personality characteristics over the political reform' success and failure.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分分析了王安石的个性特征对变法成败的影响。

sentences.english: Lively and cute characters, bearing the success or failure of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 活泼可爱的方块字，承载了中华民族的兴衰成败。

sentences.english: "All are for the market, and the details determine the success".
sentences.chinese: “一切为了市场，细节决定成败”。

definition: victory or defeat/result
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
to relate to/concerning/about
good or bad/good and bad/standard/quality
lit. success and failure, the gains and losses (idiom)/fig. to weigh up various factors
life or death
honor and disgrace/reputation
victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
gains and losses/success and failure/merits and demerits
good and bad/merits and drawbacks
profit and loss/waxing and waning
of great concern
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: to choose (literary)
constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
crucial point/crux/CL:個|个[ge4]/key/crucial/pivotal
